metadata.name: Date Night
metadata.description:
Iâ€™ll date you because I choose to. Every dawn and every dusk, I shall desire you. I will date you because you make me laugh, because I feel safe in your arms despite your flaws. I am not fazed by options in relationships, because when I am dating you, I will only date you.

In a forgetful way, I will not remember when you were born, I will forget mini anniversaries and appointments. I will never forget the first time you told me you loved me. 

You will not be my bae, you will be my heart. You will be my home. I will not post my love on Instagram to prove to the world how much I adore the way your hair feels in the morning, or how you get irritated with every pun or joke that I crack.

When we face hard times, when we struggle, I will endure for you. In the event that we disagree, I will not run away nor abandon you. It will be difficult at times to fight for the beauty in which our hearts have felt, but I will believe in you, I will believe in us, I will believe in this Date Night.
